name: Warlock
desc: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity
coolFeatures: Casts spells through a pact made with an all-powerful being
Can cast Eldritch Blast, a powerful cantrip
The pact with the being allows for limitless customization of spells, features, and inherit magical abilities
Can form a bond with a weapon, creature, or spellbook
Patrons include: Archfey, Celestial, Fiend, Great Old One, Hexblade, and the Undying
prompts: What led you to make the pact, and how did you make contact with your patron?
Did you search for your patron, or did your patron find and choose you?
What contract/agreement do you have with your patron?
Do you chafe under the obligations of your pact or serve joyfully in anticipation of the rewards promised to you?
What kind of relationship do you have with your patron?
Do you know other servants of your patron?
If your patron is the Undying, it could be the Undying Court, or the Death Queen. If it's a fiend, it could be a demonic Overlord. If it's a Great Old One, it could be a Daelkyr
